trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> allows you to restore in different modes. This depends on the permissions you have as a user logged on to the agent or an administrator managing multiple agents.

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> allows you to restore in different modes.
This depends on the permissions you have as a user logged on to the agent or an administrator managing multiple agents.

target.mrk: L'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> vous permet de restaurer dans différents modes.
Cela dépend des permissions dont vous disposez en tant qu'utilisateur connecté à l'agent ou en tant qu'administrateur gérant plusieurs agents.

trans-unit.source: This is the default mode. The restore is performed with the permission of the user currently logged in. Use current user restore to restore files belonging to the current user.

seg-source.mrk: The restore is performed with the permission of the user currently logged in. Use current user restore to restore files belonging to the current user.

target.mrk: Ce mode est le mode par défaut.
La restauration est effectuée avec les droits de l’utilisateur présentement connecté. Ce mode convient très bien si l’utilisateur courant veut restaurer ses propres fichiers.

trans-unit.source: Even if the current user belongs to an administrator group, he will not be able to perform a system restore since he does not have elevated privileges. For a system restore, the Restore As option must be used, eventually with the current user context.

seg-source.mrk: Even if the current user belongs to an administrator group, he will not be able to perform a system restore since he does not have elevated privileges.
For a system restore, the Restore As option must be used, eventually with the current user context.

target.mrk: Même si l’utilisateur courant appartient au groupe des administrateurs, il ne pourra pas effectuer de restauration système car il ne possède pas de privilèges élevés.
Pour une restauration du système, il faut forcément utiliser l’option Restaurer en tant que, même si c’est avec le compte de l’utilisateur courant.

trans-unit.source: The impersonated restore enables you to restore data with a different security context than that of the current user.

seg-source.mrk: The impersonated restore enables you to restore data with a different security context than that of the current user.

target.mrk: La restauration personnifiée vous permet de restaurer les données avec un contexte de sécurité différent de celui de l'utilisateur actuel.

trans-unit.source: On Windows, when User Account Control (UAC) is activated, the restore is performed without elevated privileges.

seg-source.mrk: On Windows, when User Account Control (UAC) is activated, the restore is performed without elevated privileges.

target.mrk: Sous Windows, lorsque le contrôle de compte d'utilisateur (UAC) est activé, la restauration s'effectue sans privilèges élevés.

trans-unit.source: The system restore enables you to restore any file, including files and folders requiring administrator level permissions.

seg-source.mrk: The system restore enables you to restore any file, including files and folders requiring administrator level permissions.

target.mrk: La restauration système permet de restaurer tous les fichiers, y compris les fichiers et dossiers demandant les privilèges administrateur.

trans-unit.source: The system restore grants you the following permissions:

seg-source.mrk: The system restore grants you the following permissions:

target.mrk: La restauration système vous donne les droits suivants :

trans-unit.source: Windows Restore as NT Authority System with all required privileges activated.

seg-source.mrk: Windows Restore as NT Authority System with all required privileges activated.

target.mrk: Windows Restauration en tant que NT Authority System avec tous les privilèges activés.

trans-unit.source: Linux and macOS Restore as UID 0, even if the operating system does not have a root user activated.

seg-source.mrk: Linux and macOS Restore as UID 0, even if the operating system does not have a root user activated.

target.mrk: Linux et macOS Restauration avec l’UID 0, même si l’utilisateur root n’est pas activé dans le système d'exploitation.

alt-trans.seg-source: Restore as UID 0, even if the operating system does not have a root user activated.
alt-trans.target: Restauration avec l’UID 0, même si l’utilisateur root n’est pas activé dans le système d'exploitation.
